conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-3;Violation of Art. 5-5;No violation of Art. 5-1;No violation of Art. 5-4;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Just satisfaction reserved
docname: CASE OF BROGAN AND OTHERS v. THE UNITED KINGDOM - [Russian Translation]
